name: Quix Configuration Enricher
shortDescription: Consume data from a Kafka topic and enrich it using a Quix Configuration Service topic.

Variables.Name: DATA_TOPIC
Variables.Description: The topic containing your data to be enriched.

Variables.Name: CONFIG_TOPIC
Variables.Description: The topic managed by your Quix Configuration Service.

Variables.Name: OUTPUT_TOPIC
Variables.Description: The topic to write the enriched data to.

Variables.Name: LOOKUP_FIELDS_JSON
Variables.Description: a JSON-serialized string that contains the desired field names with corresponding config field references. See 'get_fields' function in code for example.

Variables.Name: CONSUMER_GROUP_NAME
Variables.Description: The name of the consumer group to use when consuming from Kafka
